link.title: Compass High School | Public Tucson High School | Tuition Free

meta.name: description
meta.content: Enroll at Compass High School, The Tucson high school of choice! Call our front office: 520.296.4070 or visit our campus. Finish high school on your terms!

div.h1: A Tucson High School As Unique As You

div.class: wp-block-atomic-blocks-ab-columns ab-layout-service-3 ab-layout-columns-2 ab-2-col-wideleft ab-columns-center alignfull

img.alt: Learn Online With Compass High School Canvas
Learn Online With Compass High School Canvas

h2.strong: The Tucson High School Made Custom For You

p.em: All the resources, training, & support you need to graduate from a public charter Tucson high school on your own terms. Learn more about the Compass High School educational experience!

div.h3: Tucson High School Schedules As Unique As Our Students
div.p: With our hybrid block scheduling, students are able to fully apply themselves to their learning without getting burnt out. The flexible schedules also allow students to obtain a job or attend to other responsibilities outside of school. – View Full Schedules

h2.strong: Take Your Next Step Toward High School Graduation

div.p: For those looking to enroll at Compass High School, a public charter school in Tucson, AZ, you can call our front office at 520.296.4070 or visit our school campus. Get a jump start by filling out our enrollment packet and bring it with you on your campus visit.

div.class: wp-block-atomic-blocks-ab-columns ab-layout-service-3 ab-layout-columns-2 ab-2-col-wideright ab-columns-center alignfull

h2.strong:
Subscribe To
The Compass High School Calendar
Your Personal & Flexible High School Education Option

div.p: Compass High School is founded on the beliefs that learning can take place anywhere, not just in a formal Tucson high school class setting. High school credit is earned in many unconventional ways, such as independent studies, class travels, and internships. In addition, we want to emphasize the understanding of the learning process, for instance the personal, real-life application of knowledge. We strive to prepare Tucson high school students for their lives as adults. Finally, academic and intellectual development is balanced with building strong life skills and communication skills.

iframe.title: Compass High School Google Map Location Embed

div.h3: Average Arizona High School Teacher Salary

ol.li: Average salary of all teachers employed in budget year 2019: $41,936
Average salary of all teachers employed in prior budget year 2018: $38,124
Increase in average teacher salary from the prior year 2018: $3,812

div.p: Compass High School meets as necessary & with the establishment of a quorum. Board meeting notices are posted 24 hours in advance of the meeting on the front office window, which is visible to the public 24 hours per day, 7 days a week & on this website.

p.br:
Date: Monday, April 28th, 2020
Time: 12:00pm
Address: 8230 E 22nd St. Suite 106, 85710

div.a: Campus Closed. Your Education Continues Online. See How.
